# Windows Notification System - Version 1.0.0

Release Date: 2025-11-23

## Package Contents

- **bin/NotifyUser.exe** - Windows notification executable (57.65 MB)
- **PowerShell/** - PowerShell module for easy integration
- **README.md** - Installation and usage instructions

## System Requirements

- Windows 10 (version 1809 or later) OR Windows 11
- No .NET runtime required (self-contained)

## Installation

See README.md for detailed installation instructions.

## Quick Start

1. Add bin/ to your PATH or use absolute path
2. Import PowerShell module:
   ```powershell
   Import-Module .\PowerShell\NotifyUser.psm1
   ```
3. Display a notification:
   ```powershell
   Show-Notification -Title "Hello" -Message "World"
   ```

## Support

For issues, please visit: https://github.com/yourusername/WindowsNotificationSystem
